featured.text: The laborers mostly wore dark and dirty uniforms.
Yellow is used for general laborers and contractors, white (or sometimes black) for supervisors and managers, and green for inspectors and new workers.
Recently, new models have been introduced and accessories added to meet the needs of laborers working on various job sites.

definition.zh_def: 勞工；從事體力勞動的人。
definition.en_def: A person who does physical work, especially in manual labor.
definition.example: The laborer worked hard all day to support his family.
